definitions.definition: an alcoholic drink made from malt with hops added to give it taste. There are many types of beer.

examples.text: a **pint/can/bottle of beer**
a barrel/glass of beer
beers brewed in Germany

Are you a beer drinker?

Do you drink beer?
I ordered half a pint of beer with my sandwich.

The beer flowed freely after the game.
The shop specializes in designer beers.

definitions.definition: a glass, bottle or can of beer

examples.text: Shall we have a beer?

wordOrigin: Old English bēor, of West Germanic origin, based on monastic Latin biber ‘a drink’, from Latin bibere ‘to drink’; related to Dutch bier and German Bier.
